sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Incidental) When a character first acquires this talent, he chooses one skill: Charm, Coercion, Negotiation, or Deception. When making checks with that skill, he may spend triumph to gain additional successes equal to his ranks in Smooth Talker.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <name>Smooth talker</name> <number>TAL0001131</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-23 05:49:03</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0aa3c2c9dbaa8c542901de90cf9619a6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-23 05:49:03</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
